op.title: when is the government coming back
op.body:
on the radio they said things would be back to normal by christmas. were they lying??

my wife and kids are going hungry, and the power keeps browning out. anyone have any news at all?

replies.body: Sorry about your family, FP, but you'd best start digging their graves now if you want to make it out of this yourself. Family is nothing but a burden at this point.
Man, what I wouldn't do to have some family still left over. I finished up my sister last Wednesday.
FP, I'm going pretty hungry too. Where are you located? Maybe we can link up and go hunting or something. We'll stand a better chance at survival as a group.
Yeah FP, tell us where you're at. I found some killer recipes I've been wanting to try out.
Don't worry fp, i'm sure it's only a matter of time before this clears up. we'll get thru this together :-)
